sentences.en: A new electrical conductance measurement instrument based on bi - directional pulsed voltage technique is proposed.

trans.tran_en: the ability of a system to conduct electricity, measured by the ratio of the current flowing through the system to the potential difference across it; the reciprocal of resistance
